game.name: Service Please
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Service Please는 작은 사업으로 시작해 거대한 레스토랑 체인으로 성장하는 자원 관리 게임입니다. 레스토랑을 꾸미고, 메뉴를 개선하며, 고객 만족도를 높여 지속적으로 성장하세요. 성공은 전적으로 당신의 손에 달려 있습니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Service Please is a resource management game where you start with a small business and grow it into a massive restaurant chain. Customize your restaurant, enhance your menu, and increase customer satisfaction to keep growing. Success is entirely in your hands!
